mapper.sql:
FROM post_tour a WHERE 1=1
AND type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq AS tourSeq ,a.type AS tourType ,a.name AS tourName ,a.zip_code AS tourZip_code ,a.address AS tourAddress ,a.address_detail AS tourAddress_detail ,a.date AS tourDate ,a.note AS tourNote
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT a.* FROM post_tour a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
